attributes.action: limit the taxpayer-funded part of the Pope's visit if it goes ahead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since it is the British Government that have invited the Pope here, some of the cost of his visit will be borne by the taxpayer. This expense should be kept to a minimum, covering only the essential Government business that the Pope was invited here for. It should NOT cover touring, speaking to the masses, attending religious ceremonies, etc.

You are no doubt aware of the contentious nature of many of the Pope's views. As long as they are his sincere views, he should be entitled to express them, but the general public should not have to pay for their dissemination.
